original_text: While they were still talking with him, the king’s eunuchs arrived and hurried Haman away to the banquet Esther had prepared.
korean_text: 아직 말이 그치지 아니하여서 왕의 내시들이 이르러 하만을 데리고 에스더가 베푼 잔치에 빨리 나아가니라

sentences.original_text: While they were still talking with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그와 여전히 이야기하고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: to the banquet Esther had prepared
